Entity.name: tab_5
Entity.Entity: <VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME XI Evolution is forever changing." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="BOOK OF GUIDANCE (Vanilla) ”One of my brethren ran away in order to escape our predicament ...They felt our understanding of this world was to be forbidden.They hid something here in this room but......I lack the ability to truly see what is here!”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="CAT LOVER'S NOTES (Apotheosis) My cats seem scared of normal rats.. But have an irresistible hate towards magical rats for some reason. It's kind of cute.. But I can't brush away the feeling they distance themselves with truly divine purpose..." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="TOME OF ESSENCES (Vanilla) ”The four Essences represent the four Elements that form this visible World...Imbued with their Terrible Power one may do great deedsbut one should be Afraid of their destructive Might. To this endwe have Devised a way to remove these Dangerous Forces; seek it in the West and East.A Legend also tells that all the Elements originated from the Egg of Sky and return to It one day...”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="ALCHEMIST'S NOTE (Vanilla) ”Here I'm safe. I am safe.I left the others behind and I have locked my research so that only those with real understanding can reach it.I should not worry. As long as I resist the temptation I will be safe.I know my limits. Here I am far away from them.I should not worry.”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="GONE FISHING (Apotheosis) The grand red fish is divine bait only with it will one catch the grandest of beasts lying at the ocean's trench.Finding such a specimen often requires one's entire life however and those who have tried often return without fruit or holding defeat.Tales speak of the red fish coming to those who wait patiently at the water but only if your palm holds the right blessing." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="BOOK OF THE FOUND ARTS (grahamsperks) I've found it! The Gods have answered my prayers and they've told me what I must do...However I lack the power to do so myself and their hints are undecipherable to me. Ahem...'Find yourself immune to the wizards that render their foes helpless.''Accept 3 Gifts from the Gods that provide no permanent benefit.''Live on the bleeding edge of death and defeat foes while doing so.''Venture into the most ominous cave in this Land and seek True Knowledge within.''Find and use one of the lost Experimental Wands.'And finally... 'Travel to the center of the lost cube of Water.'I couldn't know what these hints mean. But perhaps...Someone far in the future will discover my notes and unlock this potential themselves.- Robin the scholar" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="ANCIENT TOME (Apotheosis) Knowledge is power in this world ours is vast and endless.Though it will appear forgotten to this world know I am writing this before we are sealed behind layers of rock for eternity.Consider this my mocking upon you unfortunate souls who are not privy to our wisdom.However there is no sense in asserting your dominance without showing what you can do.I have inscribed a spell upon this land prove you hold knowledge share it.I will show you that knowledge is power and I will taunt you with a fraction of ours." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="INVASIVE CHEMICALS (grahamsperks) Certain magical liquids can take over one's body and make them do horrible things they otherwise would not.Many have been killed by those they trust due to Berserkium's malicious magic.Worm blood is often ingested intentionally to help with the sight of its bearer.Combined with sand one can make a delightful delicacy.Berserkium can also be combined with corpses to make a beverage straight from Hell itself.And of course fungus can cause strange effects especially when combined with polymorphine...- Robin the scholar" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="DAY 7 (Apotheosis) I've come here in search of the legendary Red Fish I remember its name on the tip of my tongue..Something starting with H.. yet I can't recall itNo matter I'll name it after myself after I become the first to discover it.Then I'll never forget its name again!" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="DAY 297 (Apotheosis) Remember.The red fish is real.The red fish is real.The red fish is real.The red fish is real.The red fish is realThe red fish is reallThe red f" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="MATERIALIST'S NOTES (Apotheosis) Conversion.. Remember these words.... Fungus Worm Rat Spark Mass Letter Lifetime" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME XIV Attune with and home in on your goals;Do so and your arrow shall move faster." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="RESEARCH NOTES (Vanilla) “One in the pondOne in the treeOne on the ledgeOne under the sun”" >
<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME IX To walk a mile in someone else's boots." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME IV Prove thine knowledge, from what is the west created of." >
<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="ALCHEMY JOURNAL (Hydroxide) A recipe book of sorts for alchemists." >
<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME II The essence of life and death." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="INSATIABILITY (grahamsperks) And lo! The spell is cast history prewritten rewritten. These damned spiders with the thousands of teeth... their hunger insatiable unless...?I pacified them for my own survival using a spell taught to me long ago.However such a force cannot be created or destroyed... only moved redeveloped.I have sealed their willpower in this very book. Such a power could be devastating or divine.I leave that fate up to the Gods or to you curious reader...?Perhaps the Gods would enjoy this tribute of willpower as a gift...?- Robin the scholar" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="SCORCHED NOTES (Apotheosis) I remember finding a stone blazing with fire but nothing more than a gentle touch in my hand. It belonged to those fire cretins who hunted me I bet. Wanting to get back at them I threw the stone into the deepest body of lava I could find in those wretched mines.. But that was my fatal mistake. The stone seemed to attract... something. I dared not look back after hearing the lava stir violently behind me I feel lucky to be alive. My robes were scorched by it's mere presence. My pride reduced to burn marks of what it once was. I hope I need never return to that place." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="LOST ALCHEMY I used to commit alchemy here a long time ago, it was a safe hideaway where my brothers wouldn't bother me. However.. it seems these ants have taking a liking to it. ..Never the matter, to my future self, the master of alchemy, turn this metal into a material which aids with flight, and your vault will be unlocked to you. If you're someone who isn't me and you found this place, please leave what you found untouched." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME VI To have true knowledge is to see in the darkness of ignorance." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME XIII To gain true knowledge, one must remain pure and unintoxicated." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="BOOK OF CELESTIAL BODIES (Vanilla) ”As with everything else every celestial body also has its counterpart.For every golden star is a dark enigma and for every silvery moon there is a hollow shadow.”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME V Prove thine knowledge, from what is the east created of." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME I (Vanilla) Tis true without lying certain and most true.That which is below is like that which is aboveand that which is above is like that which is belowto do the miracles of one only thing.And as all things have been and arose from one by the mediation of one: so all things have their birth from this one thing by adaptation." >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="A CUNNING CONTRAPTION (Vanilla) ”The secret lies in music!The key to the heavens' lock is borne from music all over the world.And in a way as above so below...”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME VIII Awaken, the flock of the shepherd and think for thyself!" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="MUSINGS OF AN ADVENTURER (Vanilla) ”This machinery is unlike any I've seen before. Did the Hiisi create it? Or was it always here?”" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="COMFORT (grahamsperks) Oh what a cozy little place! This liquid feels cool to the touch but pleasantly so almost like mint.I had a small taste... It's good. Very good.I'm half-tempted to settle down here... but no. My exploration must continue.I'll bottle some of this liquid for later and leave the rest for someone else....Will anyone else be alive to find it?- Robin the scholar" >

<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME VII To gain true knowledge, one must slow down and not hurry." >
<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET - VOLUME XII Bring your friends along when you travel." >
<VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="ALCHEMIST'S DIARY A diary of sorts for an alchemist." >

UIIconComponent.description: You negate the next instance of damage.
UIIconComponent.name: Aegis
